incident_updates.body: The current maintenance has been postponed for 30/01/2023. You can find below the new informations. Start time : 30/01/2023 21:00 UTC End time : 30/01/2023 23:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of all services behind the concerned device during operations. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 24/01/2023 21:00 UTC End time : 24/01/2023 23:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of all services behind the concerned device during operations. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 31/01/2023 00:00 UTC  End time : 31/01/2023 04:00 UTC  Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our backbone infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.
Start time : 31/01/2023 06:30 UTC End time : 31/01/2023 08:00 UTC Service impact : The rack will be powered off for 1.5 hours. Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 31/01/2023 07:00 UTC  End time : 01/02/2023 16:00 UTC  Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing electrical works in RBX8.

Start time : 31/01/2023 07:00 UTC  End time : 31/01/2023 16:00 UTC  Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing electrical works in RBX8.

Start time : 31/01/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 31/01/2023 13:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an operation on some equipment of our backbone .

Start time : 31/01/2023 13:00 UTC End time : 31/01/2023 16:00 UTC Service impact : The servers on B715B01 rack will be unavailable during the maintenance period. Service improvement : We need to do an operation to protect an unsecured power cable.
Start time : 31/01/2023 13:00 UTC End time : 31/01/2023 14:30 UTC Service impact : The rack will be powered off for 1.5 hours. Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 31/01/2023 20:00 UTC  End time : 31/01/2023 22:00 UTC  Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our backbone infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on network equipment

The current maintenance has been postponed for 31/01/2023. You can find below the new informations. Start time : 31/01/2023 21:00 UTC End time : 31/01/2023 23:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of all services behind the concerned device. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 25/01/2023 21:00 UTC End time : 25/01/2023 23:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of all services behind the concerned device. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 31/01/2023 23:00 UTC  End time : 01/02/2023 04:00 UTC  Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our backbone infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on network equipment

Start time : 31/01/2023 23:00 UTC  End time : 01/02/2023 05:00 UTC  Service impact : Servers will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance time. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are moving servers from Rack 45B27.

Start time : 01/02/2022 07:00 UTC  End time : 01/02/2022 08:00 UTC  Service impact : No impact is expected during the maintenance. The rack will be powered by another electrical equipment. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be replacing the power distribution unit of rack GRA0321B06A.

Start time : 01/02/2023 07:00 UTC End time : 01/02/2023 16:00 UTC Service impact : Power source switched to batteries for 1 minute. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to test some UPS batteries.

Start time : 01/02/2023 07:00 UTC End time : 01/02/2023 16:00 UTC Service impact : Power source switched to batteries for 1 minute. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to test some UPS batteries.

Start time : 01/02/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 01/02/2023 13:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an operation on some equipment of our backbone .

Start time : 01/02/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 01/02/2023 10:00 UTC Service impact : For SNC customers who have not correctly configured the two active IPsec VPNs on two different VPNGWs, there will be an interruption of IP traffic between the SNC site and the customer site through the IPsec tunnel for the duration of the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

Start time : 01/02/2023 11:00 UTC End time : 02/02/2023 01:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Our teams are required to carry out operations in the vicinity of medium voltage equipment and for safety reasons they will have to switch off this equipment to carry out their operations.

Start time : 01/02/2023 20:00 UTC End time : 01/02/2023 23:30 UTC Service impact : Customers will be impacted depending on the number of ports and POPs used: - OCC 1 port : About 1 hour traffic cut is expected - OCC 2 ports : Minor traffic cut is expected (less than an hour). - OCC 2x POP : No impact expected if BGP sessions has been configured Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy and in order to have a homogeneous park for OVHcloud Connect, our teams will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment in the point of presence of Warsaw.

Start time : 01/02/2023 23:00 UTC  End time : 02/02/2023 05:00 UTC  Service impact : Servers will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance time. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are moving servers from Rack 14B02.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on our water cooling system.
